Maternal Health.question: Maxaa la sameeyaa marka la ogaado in aad uur leedahay?
Maternal Health.answer: Waa muhiim in la arko dhakhtar si loo bilaabo daryeelka uurka.

Maternal Health.question: Maxay yihiin calaamadaha digniinta ee uurka?
Maternal Health.answer: Haddii aad aragto dhiig-bax, xanuun ama wareer, la xiriir dhakhtar.

Maternal Health.question: Goorma ayay tahay in la arko dhakhtar markaad uur leedahay?
Maternal Health.answer: Bil kasta hal mar, ama sida dhakhtarku kuu faro.

Maternal Health.question: Cunto noocee ah ayay tahay in uurleydu cunto?
Maternal Health.answer: Cunto nafaqo leh sida khudrad, hilib, kalluun, iyo caano.

Maternal Health.question: Miyay uurleydu cabi karaan daawo kasta?
Maternal Health.answer: Kaliya daawooyinka uu dhakhtarku kuu qoro.

Maternal Health.question: Miyaan jimicsi samayn karaa intaan uur leeyahay?
Maternal Health.answer: Haa, jimicsi fudud sida socodka waa faa’iido leh.

Maternal Health.question: Waa maxay caadada subaxnimo ee uurleyda?
Maternal Health.answer: Waa lalabbo iyo matag subaxdii, caadi ayay u tahay.

Maternal Health.question: Sidee loo ogaadaa jinsiga ilmaha?
Maternal Health.answer: Waxaa lagu ogaan karaa ultrasound-ka usbuuca 18-20.

Maternal Health.question: Waa maxay daryeelka dhalmada kadib?
Maternal Health.answer: Ka warqabka nadiifnimada, nafaqada, iyo nasashada hooyada.

Menstrual Health.question: Waa maxay caado aan caadi ahayn?
Menstrual Health.answer: Caado aan caadi ahayn waa mid dhiig badan leh ama muddo gaaban/dheer ah.

Menstrual Health.question: Maxay yihiin xanuunada la xiriira caadada?
Menstrual Health.answer: Xanuunka caloosha, dhabarka, iyo murqaha ayaa caadi ah.

Menstrual Health.question: Miyaan caado noqon kartaa bil la'aan?
Menstrual Health.answer: Haa, cadaadis ama isbedelka jirka ayaa sababi kara.

Menstrual Health.question: Sidee loo xakameeyaa xanuunka caadada?
Menstrual Health.answer: Isticmaalka daawo xanuun baabi'isa iyo nasasho ayaa caawin kara.

Menstrual Health.question: Waa maxay caado wareer?
Menstrual Health.answer: Marka caadadu timaado wakhti kala duwan bil kasta.

Menstrual Health.question: Miyaan la socon karaa caadadayda?
Menstrual Health.answer: Haa, adigoo isticmaalaya jadwal ama app.

Menstrual Health.question: Miyaan u baahanahay in aan arko dhakhtar?
Menstrual Health.answer: Haa, haddii caadadu aad u dhib badan tahay ama aan imaan.

Menstrual Health.question: Caadadu miyay saameyn ku leedahay maskaxda?
Menstrual Health.answer: Haa, waxaa dhici karta niyad jab ama xanaaq.

Menstrual Health.question: Miyaan jimicsi sameyn karaa marka aan caadada hayo?
Menstrual Health.answer: Haa, jimicsi fudud ayaa kaa yareyn kara xanuunka.

Child Care.question: Sidee loo daryeelaa ilmo cusub?
Child Care.answer: Nadaafad joogto ah, naas nuujin iyo nasasho badan.

Child Care.question: Waa maxay sababta ilmuhu u ooyo badan yahay?
Child Care.answer: Abaal, gaajo, xanuun ama hurdo la’aan.

Child Care.question: Sidee loo ogaadaa in ilmuhu qabo xumad?
Sidee loo yareeyaa xumadda ilmaha?
Child Care.answer: Biyo badan iyo daawo uu dhakhtar qoray.

Child Care.question: Waa maxay caloosha adag ee ilmaha?
Child Care.answer: Marka ilmaha calooshiisu adkaato, badanaa waa saxaro la’aan.

Child Care.question: Ilmuhu ma u baahan yahay hurdo badan?
Child Care.answer: Haa, hurdo badan ayaa muhiim u ah korriinkiisa.

Child Care.question: Sidee loo bilaabaa cunto adag?
Child Care.answer: Kadib 6 bilood, tijaabi cunnooyin fudud sida baradho.

Child Care.question: Ilmaha miyaa la maydhaa maalin kasta?
Maxaa keena finan ilmaha wajigiisa?
Child Care.answer: Waa hormoono caadi ah, badanaa iskiis ayay u tagaan.
